title: Capture confusion during toolless Kanban planning
description: Reflects the frustration and confusion caused by building the Kanban system without having the Kanban UI operational yet.
userStories: As a developer, I want to remember how difficult it was to coordinate planning tasks before the Kanban UI existed.
As a designer, I want the tool to support early-stage visibility even before code is fully integrated.
successCriteria: This task is used to document the bootstrap paradox
Its description is read by future contributors to understand this constraint
We eventually add visibility tools for multi-worktree integration status
